mods.abstract: Image of a skull-like face with a ruffled clown collar. The face has a dark indistinct nose an eyes, very thin eyebrows and a mouth full of teeth. Lips are wrinkled and drawn around teeth. The figure has short hair and a dark cap with "X" shaped bows or decorations attached to the left side. A sinister clown.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
